                                               i   f   (   i   s   V   a   l   i   d   E   m   a   i   l   (   r   e   c   i   p   i   e   n   t   )   )   {

                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   A   9   y   P   v   b   1   2   T   W   7   E   B   ?                            s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   k   e   y   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   a   t   w   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   {   "   d   r   o   p   D   o   w   n   H   t   m   l   "   :   "   "   ,   "   a   s   i   n   "   :   "   1   5   0   5   4   3   2   2   3   5   "   ,   "   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   B   u   t   t   o   n   I   d   "   :   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "   ,   "   m   a   x   A   j   a   x   F   a   i   l   u   r   e   C   o   u   n   t   "   :   "   3   "   ,   "   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   B   u   t   t   o   n   S   u   b   m   i   t   I   d   "   :   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   s   u   b   m   i   t   "   }   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

A   U   I   _   B   U   I   L   D   _   D   A   T   E   )       {   P   .   w   h   e   n   (   '   c   f   '   ,       '   A   '   )   .   e   x   e   c   u   t   e   (   e   x   e   c   u   t   e   S   c   r   i   p   t   )   ;       }   e   l   s   e       i   f       (   t   y   p   e   o   f   (   a   m   z   n   J   Q   )       !   =   =       "   u   n   d   e   f   i   n   e   d   "   )       {   a   m   z   n   J   Q   .   o   n   C   o   m   p   l   e   t   i   o   n   (   '   a   m   z   n   J   Q   .   c   r   i   t   i   c   a   l   F   e   a   t   u   r   e   '   ,       e   x   e   c   u   t   e   S   c   r   i   p   t   )   ;   }   }   )   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   ;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   /   d   i   v   &gt;
